article_title: How Pricey Specialty Drugs Spurred CVS Health's Omnicare Deal

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: When drugs cost $1,000 a pill or $25,000 for a year of injections, insurers and employers want to make sure these prescriptions are being taken at the right place and at the right time and have the right outcome for the patient. After all, trends in insurance payment from private insurers [...]
